## âœ… How to Test

<!-- Provide clear instructions on how to test these changes. Include any necessary setup or commands. -->

1.  Clone the repository:
    bash
    git clone https://github.com/chirag127/Actionsflow-Workflow-Automation-GitHub-Actions-Starter-Kit.git
    cd Actionsflow-Workflow-Automation-GitHub-Actions-Starter-Kit
    
2.  Install dependencies:
    bash
    uv venv
    source .venv/bin/activate
    uv install
    
3.  Run the tests:
    bash
    pytest

## ðŸ“‹ Checklist

- [ ] I have updated the documentation if necessary.
- [ ] I have updated the **AGENTS.md** file if my changes affect AI agent directives or toolchain configurations.
